document.full_text: a one-year-old child survived a fall from a fourth-floor orlando hotel balcony by landing in the arms of a british tourist, according to a police report released on thursday.
document.title: british tourist saves toddler in four-story fall
lines_and_colors: a one-year-old child survived a fall from a fourth-floor orlando hotel balcony by landing in the arms of a british tourist, according to a police report released on thursday.
